
Combine all terms to one data frame
```{r}
mesh_levels = rbind(
  data.frame(Level = 1, Descriptor = ml1$Desc),
  data.frame(Level = 2, Descriptor = ml2$DescriptorName),
  data.frame(Level = 3, Descriptor = ml3$DescriptorName)
)
sample_n(mesh_levels, 5)
```
